trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism to create uniquely named identifiers throughout a specified range of activities.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IIdentifierCreationService> provides a mechanism to create uniquely named identifiers throughout a range of activities.
Provides a mechanism to ensure that Activities added to a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> are uniquely named.

Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IIdentifierCreationService.EnsureUniqueIdentifiers%2A> to ensure activities inserted into a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> have unique identifiers.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity"></xref> that will contain the uniquely named activities.
A collection of activities to ensure that activities are uniquely named.
Provides a mechanism to test that an identifier is unique within an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.

Use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IIdentifierCreationService.ValidateIdentifier%2A> to make sure an identifier is unique and properly formatted for use within a specified <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> against which to test the identifier.
The identifier to test for validity.
